title: DO NOT GIVE UP
itunes:title: DO NOT GIVE UP
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
When life knocks you down, don't give up, get back up and fight harder. One of the Best Motivational Speeches Ever featuring Marcus Elevation Taylor (https://bit.ly/MarcusTaylorMotiversity), Jessica Houston (https://bit.ly/DrJessicaHoustonMotiversity), and Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity).


"Get out of the way. Your fear has been in the way too long. Your insecurity has been in the way too long. Your envy has been in the way too long. Get out of the way!"


Music by Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic).


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
